titleStmt.title: The chariot and horsemen of Israel A discourse of prayer: shewing what it is, as also the meanes to attaine to the practise of it. An exercise so rare in the world, and yet so requisite, as few vse it aright, and none may omit it. By Henry Langley, minister of the Word of God, at Treswell in the county of Nottingham.
titleStmt.author: Langley, Henry, d. 1636.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for Edmund Weauer,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
